resources.string: 1. The game consists of 1 judge and 2–9 players.
2. The judge will come up with a number between 1 and 100 (excluding the two numbers). Let\'s call it the \"bomb number\".
3. The first player will select a number between 1 and 100, trying to avoid the bomb number.
4. If the first player did not hit the bomb number, the range of numbers available is reduced to between 1/100 and their chosen value, whichever contains the bomb number.
5. The next players keep on selecting numbers and reducing the range of available numbers until one unlucky player hits the bomb :(
Example: The bomb number is 60, and the first player selects 50 among 1 to 100.
The available range is reduced to between 50 to 100.
The available range is reduced to between 50 to 70.
The third player selects 60, which is the bomb number. BOOM! I guess he has to pay the bill…?
